channel.title: CVE Feed for WillyXJ -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-24571|2024-01-31T22:32:51.646Z -- willyxj -- facilemanager
item.description: facileManager is a modular suite of web apps built with the sysadmin in mind. For the facileManager web application versions 4.5.0 and earlier, we have found that XSS was present in almost all of the input fields as there is insufficient input validation.
